disciplines.name: Biopsionics
disciplines.description: Master the arts of physical healing and bodily control

core_technique.name: Psychic Succor
core_technique.description: Heal 1d6+1 HP with a touch as an action. Can be used on self.

techniques.name: Invincible Stand
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. Gain 1d10 temporary HP per Psychic skill level.

techniques.name: Mastered Succor
techniques.description: Healing touch heals 2d6+2 HP instead. Can stabilize dying allies instantly.

techniques.name: Organic Purification
techniques.description: Remove disease, poison, or infection from a target with a touch.

core_technique.name: Psychic Refinement
core_technique.description: Gain +1 maximum Effort. This benefit is permanent and always active.

techniques.name: Psychic Static
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. All hostile psychic abilities within 30m fail.

techniques.name: Deep Intrusion
techniques.description: Increase range of psychic powers by 100m. Ignore line-of-sight requirements.

techniques.name: Empowered Techniques
techniques.description: Your psychic techniques do +2 damage or heal +2 HP.

disciplines.name: Precognition
disciplines.description: Sense and manipulate the flow of probable futures

core_technique.name: Oracle
core_technique.description: Ask the GM one yes/no question about the immediate future. GM must answer truthfully.

techniques.name: Tactical Precognition
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. Gain +2 to initiative and AC.

techniques.name: Forewarning
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the day. Gain perfect awareness of ambushes and surprise attacks.

techniques.name: Terminal Reflection
techniques.description: Once per scene, force an enemy to reroll an attack that would hit you.

disciplines.name: Telekinesis
disciplines.description: Move objects and creatures with the power of thought

core_technique.name: Telekinetic Manipulation
core_technique.description: Move objects up to 200kg within sight. Can use to attack for 1d6 damage.

techniques.name: Kinetic Transversal
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. Fly at normal movement speed.

techniques.name: Pressure Field
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. Gain +2 AC from telekinetic deflection.

techniques.name: Telekinetic Maelstrom
techniques.description: All targets within 30m take 2d6 damage from flying debris. No cover available.

disciplines.name: Telepathy
disciplines.description: Read and influence the thoughts of others

core_technique.name: Telepathic Contact
core_technique.description: Establish mental communication with willing target within 50m.

techniques.name: Mind Reading
techniques.description: Read surface thoughts of visible target. Opposed Mental save to resist.

techniques.name: Telepathic Assault
techniques.description: Attack target's mind for 1d10 damage. Ignores armor. Mental save for half.

techniques.name: Memory Editing
techniques.description: Add, remove, or alter memories in a helpless or willing target.

core_technique.name: Personal Apportation
core_technique.description: Teleport up to 10m to a visible location as a move action.

techniques.name: Spatial Distortion
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. Melee attacks against you have 50% miss chance.

techniques.name: Teleportation Surge
techniques.description: Teleport up to 100m to any location you've previously visited.

techniques.name: Phase Shift
techniques.description: Commit Effort for the scene. Become partially intangible. Ignore obstacles and attacks.
